name: How can we use blockchain and AI to amplify environmental protection for the Tara River?

--tw-backdrop-opacity: ; --tw-backdrop-saturate: ; --tw-backdrop-sepia: ;">asmine Alakari</span></span>">asmine Alakari will lead a talk on the ecological potentials of Montenegro, focused around the Tara and Moraca river. The challenge is to think about how we can develop tools through blockchain and AI for the management of natural ecosystems and resources, rethink existing and ineffective governance and regulatory structures to create a sustainable, resilient, and biodiverse future. Our partners have already protected one river in Albania, and we are developing the next project with a replicable system to protect the wild rivers in Montenegro. We invite you for an open discussion on how we can harness the power of new technologies in creating future standards for environmental protection. If we figure out how to protect the veins of the world globally, the implications for future generations would be unprecedented.
